title: Topic 002 Question 030
body: You have an Azure IoT hub that uses a Device Provisioning Service instance.
You create a new individual device enrollment that uses symmetric key attestation.
Which detail from the enrollment is required to auto provision the device by using the Device Provisioning Service?
options: the registration ID and the primary key of the enrollment
the primary key and the secondary key of the enrollment
the hostname of the IoT hub
